title: Two vintage-looking curvy serif faces on Blancanieves movie poster
content:
I am having trouble identifying the serif faces used for the Blancanieves name and for the actors' names below that. I already found Florentine Cursive.  
 [http://impawards.com/intl/spain/2012/blancanieves.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818174756/http:/impawards.com/intl/spain/2012/blancanieves.html "http://impawards.com/intl/spain/2012/blancanieves.html")
author: Bald Condensed

comments.content: i get creepy Souvenir vibes from the movie title.
Whatthefont is coming up with nothing. Rats…
Verdu is [Edwardian Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818174756/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/elsnerflake/edwardian_light_ot/). might find that more of the poster is the same.
Believe it or not, I came up with Edwardian myself on our 45-minute bike ride home. Thanks Jodie! :)
isn't it amazing where our brains go when we do things like that. you wouldn't believe the things i've worked out while mowing the grass.

For me it was walking the dog. The dog died a few years ago. I haven't done much deep thinking since then.

hhp
